afBarrFunc: var singleRslt=resultsArr[0];var wrdCountArr=singleRslt.wcArr;var totalWrds=singleRslt.wcTotal;var acu=0;for(i=0;i<wrdCountArr.length;i++){  acu+=wrdCountArr[i];}if(acu==totalWrds){  result='Results match! '+acu+' = '+totalWrds;}else{  result='Does not match! '+acu+' != '+totalWrds;}
